quote: Six hundred and forty fish later, the only thing I know is everything you love will die. The first time you meet someone special, you can count on them one day being dead and in the ground.
quote_letters: SIX HUNDRED AND FORTY FISH LATER THE ONLY THING I KNOW IS EVERYTHING YOU LOVE WILL DIE THE FIRST TIME YOU MEET SOMEONE SPECIAL YOU CAN COUNT ON THEM ONE DAY BEING DEAD AND IN THE GROUND
